main.name: Devansh Sharma
main.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and Data Science Enthusiast
main.bio: My name is Devansh, I'm a student at Bennett University. I'm in my 4th year of B.tech in Computer Science. I'm an AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner, with interests in networks and DBMS. I love to code in Python and work on Machine Learning problems. I am starting to get into Web development recently and currently learning Django and React.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description: Deployed sentiment analysis on tweets having a particular keyword. Built a dashboard that visualises the spatial data relating to the sentiment scores. Worked with technologies like - Tweepy, Text Blob, NLTK, VADER, Plotly

projects.title: Video Classification using Deep Learning
projects.category: Video Analysis to Detect Suspicious Activity Based on Deep Learning

projects.title: Beautified CraigsList using BeautifulSoup
projects.category: Searching Craigslist with an Attractive UI
